Module suchagame.suchagame
Package suchagame.ecs.component

Class AnimationComponent

java.lang.Object
suchagame.ecs.component.Component
suchagame.ecs.component.AnimationComponent
public class AnimationComponent extends Component
Component for managing animations of a graphical object using sprite sheet.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationComponent

      public AnimationComponent(GraphicComponent graphicComponent, int framerate, AnimationComponent.ACTION initAction, int initFrame, int[] framesCountPerRow)
      Constructs an AnimationComponent object.
      Parameters:
      graphicComponent - the associated graphic component for the animation
      framerate - the frame rate of the animations in frames per second
      initAction - the initial action of the animation
      initFrame - the initial frame of the animation in the sprite sheet
      framesCountPerRow - an array specifying the number of frames per row for each action
